net.sourceforge.groboutils.codecoverage.v2.compiler
Class ModifiedInstructionList

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.groboutils.codecoverage.v2.compiler.ModifiedInstructionList
public class ModifiedInstructionList
extends java.lang.Object

Refers to a class file that has been modified with additional logging statements.

As of January 22, 2003, the appending of probes to the end of the instruction list is no longer supported; supporting it would mean that instructions will be added to a method after the final "return" calls, which might cause class file validation errors.

Since:
December 17, 2002
Version:
$Date: 2004/04/15 05:48:25 $
Author:
Matt Albrecht groboclown@users.sourceforge.net
